description: This file implements advanced worker functions for an HTTP proxy object, handling socket acceptance, removal, query processing, synchronization, send completion, and notifications related to server socket events in a proxy environment.

methods.name: BOOL HttpApoPubwoAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PANSC_HANDLE phClientContext)
methods.description: Handles accepting a new socket connection by allocating a buffer descriptor and associating it with the server socket.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpApoPubwoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the server connection, disassociates context, updates transaction records, and potentially closes the client session when appropriate.

methods.name: ULONG HttpApoPubwoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes incoming data on the socket, checks transaction state, and determines process mode or synchronization actions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpApoPubwoProcessSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Performs synchronous processing of data received, forwarding to the server or handling the data as per transaction record state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpApoPubwoProcessAsync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Asynchronous processing placeholder; currently non-operational (not applicable).

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpApoPubwoSendComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved,ANSC_STATUS status)
methods.description: Handles completion of send operations, currently performs no specific action.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpApoPubwoNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ULONG ulEvent,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles server socket events such as errors and closure, updating transaction states and cleaning connections as needed.
